properties.originatingSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
properties.publicRemarks: This home is the envy of the community. Call me to find out why! This is more than just a home—it's the lifestyle upgrade you've been waiting for. Perfectly positioned on a premium corner lot at the end of a peaceful cul-de-sac, this stunning 5-bedroom, 3-bathroom masterpiece in the prestigious Heritage Lake community offers the ideal blend of elegance, comfort, and modern luxury. With freshly painted interiors, brand-new flooring throughout, and beautifully updated kitchen cabinetry, every inch of this home has been thoughtfully refreshed to feel brand new. Step into the heart of the home—a gourmet chef's kitchen designed to impress, featuring sleek countertops, ample cabinetry, and an expansive island that makes entertaining effortless. The open-concept layout flows seamlessly into spacious living and dining areas, creating an inviting environment perfect for hosting or relaxing with loved ones. But the magic doesn't stop inside. Step out into your private backyard paradise, custom-built for unforgettable gatherings and peaceful nights. Enjoy a fully equipped built-in BBQ, an oversized outdoor island, and a cozy gas fire pit—all under the stars in your own slice of heaven. A rare three-car garage with tandem space adds both convenience and flexibility, and a downstairs bedroom with a full bath offers the perfect setup for a private guest suite or multi-generational living. What truly sets this home apart is its location in the resort-style community of Heritage Lake—a place where every day feels like a getaway. From tranquil walking trails and a sparkling pool to a scenic lake with paddle boats and a gorgeous clubhouse, this community is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. This is a rare opportunity to own a home that checks every box—and then some. With top-rated schools, high-end shopping, and dining just minutes away, you'll enjoy a lifestyle that's as convenient as it is luxurious. Homes like this don't come around often—and they don't last long.
